General.Name: Pan-Pacific
General.Description: Pan-Pacific Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of apparel and materials in South Korea, Indonesia, Vietnam, Myanmar, China, the United States, and internationally. It offers woven products, such as jackets, pants, sportswear, and outdoor clothing; light woven products, including women's top blouses and dresses; knit products comprising yoga and active wear products; and shirts. The company also provides warm and feather products under the Prauden brand; and polyester-based thermal insulation fiber filler under the Absolon and Syncloud brands. In addition, it offers bedding products under the Sofraum, Beontre, and Sheridan brand names; and food products, such as dry rice powder, puffed rice powder, and premix under the HAET BANG A brand, as well as acquires, operates, and manages real estate assets. Pan-Pacific Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
